TEXT.S: DeJuan Blair unu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u p'agal tins' tay suruw. DeJuan Blair i 2009 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 37, namapili' tu nu San Antonio Spurs putiput. tatama, lumeniay a tademaw, nalecuhan i 4 a bulad 22 a demiad, 1989 a mihcaan, DeJuan Blair, miunduay.
